list.name: Changes
list.comment: Make the rebuild in BasePage a dependency rather than a necessary using a height > 0 check before setState.

task.summary: Default task
Rename BaseUILayout to BaseUIContents.

Correct AppDataPreferencesMixin.
Convert getMap and setMap to Map<String, Function> and use .call() and .call(value) respectively to execute.
The setting of a drawLayoutBounds default appears to be working, but check.

Add testBool, testDouble, testInt, testString and testStringList to AppData and print to screen values in _TestBaseUIContents.
AppDataPreferenceService has been tested and appears to be working. Without the functionality to change AppData field values via the app itself, the .json file that contains the shared_preference information was edited between app builds to simulate this. On rebuild the app displayed the new data.

Disable instantiation of bottomAppBar in _BaseUIViewState.
routeMap in base_ui_route_map.dart modified so that keys are Strings.
This commit builds and runs as expected.
Reconfigure key-value pairs for routeMap.
Add _SettingsUIContents, a new StatefulWidget in settings_ui_contents.dart.

Resolve issue associated with Scaffold.geometryOf being triggered by instance of BottomAppBar.
This commit includes removal of base_ui_view.dart. The functionality that this wiget offered is subsumed within BaseUI.
This commit also includes an additional FloatingActionButton as a test.
Need to tidy up

Rename BaseUI -> BasePage, BaseUIContents -> BasePageSpecs.
Delete base_ui_view.dart.
Update comments and ToDo list.
Add files_page_specs.dart. Add second item to BasePageSpecs.floatingActionButtonTargetList.
Implement prototype FloatingActionButtonArray as a function within _BasePageState.
Abstract out fabArray function as BasePageButtonArray.

Update BasePageButtonArray using Iterable and a modification of the Dart Intersperse package to insert a SizedBox between each element.
https://pub.dev/packages/intersperse/versions
Wrap BasePageButtonArray and its elements and AppBar title in BoxedContainer.

Reimplement ability for user to set drawLayoutBounds.
Also add RoundedRectangleBorder shape to Card in SettingsUIListTile.

Attempt to fix problem associated with previous commit.
Introduce an intermediary StatefulWidget, BBoxedContainer, to consider the GetItMix. Add in a secoindary StatefulWidget, _BBoxedContainer, to perform the overlay management fuction.

Successful attempt at using overlays in Fluuter to produce a pink square that can betoggled on and off using SettingsPageListTile.
Currently only the overarching bounding box for ButtonArray, not individual buttons, is used with BBoxedContainer and overlays. This is for diagnostic/development purposes.
In order to force a rebuild of _BBoxedContainer in BBoxedContainer a UniqueKey() is supplied.
Increase size of pink box to prove that it obscures the clickable SettingsPageListTiles below. Problem.
Use IgnorablePointer to allow widgets below the pink square to be clicked.
Successfully enclosed ButtonArray with a semi-opaque Container.
Address offset caused by adjusting childRect to account for borderWidth in _BBoxedContainerState.

Update BBoxedContainer to account for a very small child.
Check nullable variables.
Implement widget.child null check to avoid zero or negative box constraints.

Movement of tiles on settings page fixed with NewContainer.
NewContainer is a temporary new name for BBoxedContainer to differentiate it from (old) BoxedContainer in order to find and replace all instances of the old type.
Rename NewContainer as BoxedContainer and the original BozedContainer as OldBoxedContainer.
Add call to setState in BoxedContainer2 in order to persist the effect of 'drawLayoutBounds = true' through page/route changes.

The effect of drawLayoutBounds persists correctly through page/route changes; unfortunately the use of Stack messes up the location of the FAB associated with BsePage.
Save branch before tweaking the use of Overlays in BoxedContainer2.

BoxedContainer6 implements the effect of drawLayoutBounds persisting correctly through page/route changes. The instance of Stack was removed fixed the wondering FAB.
There may still be issues associated with a FAB ghost appearing on screen.

Save.
BoxedContainer2 offers an improved implementation of drawing layout bounds around widgets. This implementation appears to correctly persist the effect of drawlLayoutBounds through page/route changes.

Update BasePage with a reduced build time.
Check BoxedContainer2 functionality and delete other attempts.
Update comments.
Make the rebuild in BasePage a dependency rather than a necessary using a height > 0 check before setState.

MESSAGE.value:
Resolve issue associated with Scaffold.geometryOf being triggered by instance of BottomAppBar.
This commit includes removal of base_ui_view.dart. The functionality that this wiget offered is subsumed within BaseUI.
This commit also includes an additional FloatingActionButton as a test.
Need to tidy up

Rename BaseUI -> BasePage, BaseUIContents -> BasePageSpecs.
Delete base_ui_view.dart.
Update comments and ToDo list.
Add files_page_specs.dart. Add second item to BasePageSpecs.floatingActionButtonTargetList.
Implement prototype FloatingActionButtonArray as a function within _BasePageState.
Abstract out fabArray function as BasePageButtonArray.

Update BasePageButtonArray using Iterable and a modification of the Dart Intersperse package to insert a SizedBox between each element.
https://pub.dev/packages/intersperse/versions
Wrap BasePageButtonArray and its elements and AppBar title in BoxedContainer.

Reimplement ability for user to set drawLayoutBounds.
Also add RoundedRectangleBorder shape to Card in SettingsUIListTile.

Attempt to fix problem associated with previous commit.
Introduce an intermediary StatefulWidget, BBoxedContainer, to consider the GetItMix. Add in a secoindary StatefulWidget, _BBoxedContainer, to perform the overlay management fuction.

Successful attempt at using overlays in Fluuter to produce a pink square that can betoggled on and off using SettingsPageListTile.
Currently only the overarching bounding box for ButtonArray, not individual buttons, is used with BBoxedContainer and overlays. This is for diagnostic/development purposes.
In order to force a rebuild of _BBoxedContainer in BBoxedContainer a UniqueKey() is supplied.
Increase size of pink box to prove that it obscures the clickable SettingsPageListTiles below. Problem.
Use IgnorablePointer to allow widgets below the pink square to be clicked.
Successfully enclosed ButtonArray with a semi-opaque Container.
Address offset caused by adjusting childRect to account for borderWidth in _BBoxedContainerState.

Update BBoxedContainer to account for a very small child.
Check nullable variables.
Implement widget.child null check to avoid zero or negative box constraints.

Movement of tiles on settings page fixed with NewContainer.
NewContainer is a temporary new name for BBoxedContainer to differentiate it from (old) BoxedContainer in order to find and replace all instances of the old type.
Rename NewContainer as BoxedContainer and the original BozedContainer as OldBoxedContainer.
Add call to setState in BoxedContainer2 in order to persist the effect of 'drawLayoutBounds = true' through page/route changes.

The effect of drawLayoutBounds persists correctly through page/route changes; unfortunately the use of Stack messes up the location of the FAB associated with BsePage.
Save branch before tweaking the use of Overlays in BoxedContainer2.

BoxedContainer6 implements the effect of drawLayoutBounds persisting correctly through page/route changes. The instance of Stack was removed fixed the wondering FAB.
There may still be issues associated with a FAB ghost appearing on screen.

Save.
BoxedContainer2 offers an improved implementation of drawing layout bounds around widgets. This implementation appears to correctly persist the effect of drawlLayoutBounds through page/route changes.

Update BasePage with a reduced build time.
Check BoxedContainer2 functionality and delete other attempts.
Update comments.
Make the rebuild in BasePage a dependency rather than a necessary using a height > 0 check before setState.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Make the rebuild in BasePage a dependency rather than a necessary using a height > 0 check before setState.
